name: Icecast Now Playing
author: Wlliam J. Galway

sections.description: Displays Icecast server connection statistics for a given mount point. Allows visitors to listen to your audio stream from your blog, view the current tracks playing, and number of listeners. To see the plugin in action visit http://www.galwayland.com/icecast-now-playing/.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How many mount points does the plugin support?

The plugin supports 3 mount points.

What version of Icecast does the plugin support?

The plugin is tested up to Icecast version 4.9.4 .
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Added Ajax Refresh Timer

1.7

  • Updated constructs for php 7.

1.6.4

  • Removed .m3u extenstion from link to play audio stream so google chrome
    can play stream from within the web browser.

1.6.2

  • Updated the Icecast server connection error to be more user friendly.

1.6.1

  • Added additional mount point

1.6

  • Added additional mount point
  • Added mount description

1.5.1

  • Changed widget name and description.
  • Added GNU 3 license info.

1.5

  • Improved error handling and modified plugin layout.

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Displays Icecast current song playing, number of listeners, and a link to play the audio stream.
description: Displays Icecast server connection statistics for a given mount point. Allows visitors to listen to your audio stream from your blog, view the current tracks playing, and number of listeners. To see the plugin in action visit http://www.galwayland.com/icecast-now-playing/.

upgrade_notice.1.6.1: Added additional mount point to support a total of 3 audio streams.
upgrade_notice.1.6: Added additional mount point and mount description.
upgrade_notice.1.5: Improved error handling and performance. An upgrade is strongly recommended.

screenshots.caption: Example of widget with Twenty Fourteen Theme.
